node.statement: IMPLICATION (3)⟹(1) STABILIZER CHAIN: Let G_B = {g ∈ G : g(B) = B}. Since α ∈ B, we have G_α ≤ G_B. Since |B| > 1, pick β ∈ B with β ≠ α. By transitivity, there exists g ∈ G with g(α) = β. Since B is a block and g(α) = β ∈ B, we have g(B) = B, so g ∈ G_B. But g(α) = β ≠ α, so g ∉ G_α. Thus G_α < G_B.
